channel.title: Posts on Sharla Gelfand
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sharla Gelfand

item.title: Tidying and mapping Toronto open data
item.description: According to the 2017 Open Cities Index Results, the city of Toronto ranks second in Canada in terms of open data maturity. With 250+ data sets, this initiative makes it easy to access information on business, culture, environment, finance, health, parks + rec, public safety, transportation, and more. I was curious to poke around open data and learn something new along the way, both in terms of Toronto and the R ecosystem.

item.title: Are people obsessed with Virgos?
item.description: As you may know, I like astrology. Astro Poets is a great twitter account run by two poets who post painfully accurate descriptions and commentary on the twelve zodiac signs. Today they tweeted that a Viirgo wrote in asking if people like tweets about Virgos more. Now, Iâ€™m not a Virgo, and they definitely made fun of the person for asking â€“ but now I gotta know.
